00049 /**
00050  *  this class summarizes a single genotype
00051  */
00052 class cluster_data {
00053 
00054 public:
00055         // mean/variance
00056         // strength of both
00057         double m; ///< mean of cluster
00058         double ss; ///< variance of cluster
00059         double k; ///< strength of mean (pseudo-observations)
00060         double v; ///< strength of variance (pseudo-observations)
00061         double ym; ///< mean of cluster in other dimension
00062         double yss; ///< variance of cluster in other dimension
00063         double xyss; ///< covariance of cluster in both directions
00064 
00065         /** set the values */
00066         void Set(double im, double iss, double ik, double iv, double iym, double iyss, double ixyss){
00067                 m=im;
00068                 ss = iss;
00069                 k=ik;
00070                 v = iv;
00071                 ym = iym;
00072                 yss = iyss;
00073                 xyss = ixyss;
00074         };
00075         /** copy from another cluster */
00076         void Copy(cluster_data &source){
00077                 m = source.m;
00078                 ss = source.ss;
00079                 k = source.k;
00080                 v = source.v;
00081                 ym = source.ym;
00082                 yss = source.yss;
00083                 xyss = source.xyss;
00084         };
00085         /** do a diagnostic dump */
00086         void Dump(){
00087                 printf("%lf %lf %lf %lf %lf %lf %lf\n",m,ss,k,v, ym, yss, xyss);
00088         }
00089   void Clear(){
00090                 m    = 0.0;
00091                 ss   = 0.0;
00092                 k    = 0.0;
00093                 v    = 0.0;
00094                 ym   = 0.0;
00095                 yss  = 0.0;
00096                 xyss = 0.0;
00097   };
00098 };

00100 /** this class summarizes binned data */
00101 class binned_data{
00102 public:
00103         // length of data
00104         int length;
00105         int NS;
00106         int ZS;
00107         //bin summaries
00108         std::vector<double> nz; ///< number of things in each bin
00109         std::vector<double> zz; ///< sum of things in each bin
00110         std::vector<double> zzx; ///< sum of squares in each bin
00111         // bin summaries y
00112         std::vector<double> zy; ///< sum of y values in each bin
00113         std::vector<double> zzy; ///< sum of squares of y values in each bin
00114         // cross terms
00115         std::vector<double> zxy; ///< sum of x*y values in each bin
00116         // hints: counts of genotypes per bin
00117         std::vector<double> nod; ///< penalty*number of hint genotypes not d
00118         std::vector<double> noh; ///< penalty*number of hint genotypes not h
00119         std::vector<double> noc; ///< penalty*number of hint genotypes not c
00120         // soft genotypes by bin
00121         std::vector<double> ec;
00122         std::vector<double> ed;
00123         std::vector<double> eh;
00124 };

00126 /** this class holds all three genotype clusters */
00127 class snp_distribution{
00128 public:
00129         // prior
00130         // note: a-b for transform
00131         // therefore bb allele is negative
00132         // despite allegations to the contrary
00133         cluster_data aa; ///< aa allele cluster
00134         cluster_data ab; ///< ab genotype cluster
00135         cluster_data bb; ///< bb genotype cluster
00136 
00137         // cross-correlation terms
00138         // Like everything else, in pseudo-obs
00139         // Can be asymmetrical because of rotation between variances within clusters
00140         double xah,xab,xhb; ///< cross-correlation terms between clusters x
00141         double yah,yab,yhb; ///< cross-correlation terms between clusters y
00142         double xyah,xyab,xyhb; ///< cross-correlation terms between clusters x and y
00143         double yxah,yxab,yxhb; ///< cross-correlation terms between clusters y and x
00144 
00145         void Copy(snp_distribution &s)
00146         {
00147                 aa.Copy(s.aa);
00148                 ab.Copy(s.ab);
00149                 bb.Copy(s.bb);
00150                 xah = s.xah;
00151                 xab = s.xab;
00152                 xhb = s.xhb;
00153                 yah = s.yah;
00154                 yab = s.yab;
00155                 yhb = s.yhb;
00156                 xyah = s.xyah;
00157                 xyab = s.xyab;
00158                 xyhb = s.xyhb;
00159                 yxah = s.yxah;
00160                 yxab = s.yxab;
00161                 yxhb = s.yxhb;
00162         }
00163   void Clear_Cross() {
00164                 xah  = 0.0;
00165                 xab  = 0.0;
00166                 xhb  = 0.0;
00167                 yah  = 0.0;
00168                 yab  = 0.0;
00169                 yhb  = 0.0;
00170                 xyah = 0.0;
00171                 xyab = 0.0;
00172                 xyhb = 0.0;
00173                 yxah = 0.0;
00174                 yxab = 0.0;
00175                 yxhb = 0.0;
00176   };
00177   void Clear() {
00178     aa.Clear();
00179     ab.Clear();
00180     bb.Clear();
00181     Clear_Cross();
00182   };
00183 };

00185 /** this holds all the parameters for a snp, including alg choices */
00186 class snp_param{
00187 public:
00188 
00189         snp_distribution prior;
00190         snp_distribution posterior;
00191         
00192         // hints
00193         int comvar; ///< do we use common variances for all clusters?
00194         double lambda; ///< control mixing of variances if common
00195         int callmethod; ///< do we use raw labels or posterior distributions?
00196         int hardshell;  ///< do we stop cluster centers from being too close?
00197         double shellbarrier; ///< how close can cluster centers be?
00198         int bins;  ///< use quick method
00199         int copynumber; ///< only one copy, for example, XY snps
00200         int hints; ///< use hinted genotypes as reference
00201         double contradictionpenalty; ///< penalty for contradicting a hint
00202         int hok; ///< allow hints to be flipped in genotype 0,1,2<->2,1,0
00203         int mix; ///< turn on mixture distribution penalty
00204         double bic; ///< bic penalty level bic*nparam*log(n)
00205         double CSepPen; ///< penalty for FLD separation too low
00206         double CSepThr; ///< stop penalizing using Geman-McClure
00207         double wobble; ///< how much do we allow clusters to shift from prior
00208         double copyqc; ///< check for possible outlier "size" values
00209         int copytype; ///< how to handle copy number outlier detection
00210         int clustertype; ///< do I handle multiple cluster dimensions
00211         double ocean; ///< uniform density to compare weird data points against
00212         double inflatePRA; ///< increase variance by uncertainty in mean location when making calls
00213         double IsoHetY; ///< ensure Het > average Hom Y by at least epsilon
00214 
00215         // safetyparameter
00216         double SafetyFrequency; ///< ensure avoid taking log of zero frequencies
00217 
00218         /** initialize to some useful defaults */
00219         void Initialize(){
00220                 prior.aa.Set(.66,.005,4,10, 9, 0.1, 0);
00221                 prior.ab.Set(0,.01,.2,10,9,0.1,0);
00222                 prior.bb.Set(-.66,.005,4,10,9,0.1,0);
00223                 prior.xah=prior.xab=prior.xhb=0;
00224                 prior.yah=prior.yab=prior.yhb=0;
00225                 prior.xyah=prior.xyab=prior.xyhb=0;
00226                 prior.yxah=prior.yxab=prior.yxhb=0;
00227                 posterior.Copy(prior);
00228 
00229                 comvar=1;
00230                 lambda = 1;
00231                 callmethod = 0; // labeling
00232                 hardshell=2;
00233                 shellbarrier = .05;
00234                 bins = 0; // no bins used
00235                 copynumber = 2; // default two copies
00236                 hints = 0;
00237                 contradictionpenalty = 0; // no penalty
00238                 hok = 0;
00239                 mix = 0; // no mixture penalty
00240                 bic = 0; // no bic turned on
00241                 wobble = 0.00001; // max prior 100,000 data points
00242                 copyqc = 0; // no test for copy qc
00243                 copytype = 0; // standard copy qc method
00244                 clustertype = 1; // standard 1-d clustering only
00245                 CSepPen = 0;
00246                 CSepThr = 16;
00247                 ocean = 0; // similar to copyqc, turn this off normally
00248                 inflatePRA = 0; // no increase in uncertainty
00249                 IsoHetY = 0; // nothing here
00250                 SafetyFrequency= 1; // at least one count per genotype safety
00251         };
00252         /** copy parameters */
00253         void copy(snp_param s){
00254                 // copy prior
00255                 prior.Copy(s.prior);
00256 
00257                 // copy posterior
00258                 posterior.Copy(s.posterior);
00259 
00260 
00261                 // copy algorithm tweaks/parameters
00262                 comvar=s.comvar;
00263                 lambda=s.lambda;
00264                 hardshell=s.hardshell;
00265                 shellbarrier=s.shellbarrier;
00266                 callmethod = s.callmethod;
00267                 copynumber = s.copynumber;
00268                 bins = s.bins;
00269                 hints = s.hints;
00270                 contradictionpenalty = s.contradictionpenalty;
00271                 hok = s.hok;
00272                 mix = s.mix;
00273                 bic = s.bic;
00274                 wobble = s.wobble;
00275                 copyqc = s.copyqc;
00276                 copytype = s.copytype;
00277                 clustertype = s.clustertype;
00278                 CSepPen = s.CSepPen;
00279                 CSepThr = s.CSepThr;
00280                 ocean = s.ocean;
00281                 inflatePRA = s.inflatePRA;
00282                 IsoHetY = s.IsoHetY;
00283                 SafetyFrequency = s.SafetyFrequency;
00284         };
00285         /** get only the prior value from some source*/
00286         void getprior(snp_param s){
00287                 // just copy the prior data over
00288                 // keep the current methods
00289                 prior.Copy(s.prior);
00290         };
00291         /** transfer prior directly to posterior */
00292         void priortoposterior(){
00293                 posterior.Copy(prior);
00294         }
00295     void setDocValues(SelfDoc &doc) {
00296         // prior strength
00297         doc.setOptValue("KX",ToStr(prior.aa.k));
00298         doc.setOptValue("KH",ToStr(prior.ab.k));
00299         doc.setOptValue("V",ToStr(prior.ab.v));
00300 
00301         // prior centers
00302         doc.setOptValue("BBM",ToStr(prior.bb.m));
00303         doc.setOptValue("ABM",ToStr(prior.ab.m));
00304         doc.setOptValue("AAM",ToStr(prior.aa.m));
00305 
00306         doc.setOptValue("BBY",ToStr(prior.bb.ym));
00307         doc.setOptValue("ABY",ToStr(prior.ab.ym));
00308         doc.setOptValue("AAY",ToStr(prior.aa.ym));
00309 
00310         // prior variances
00311         doc.setOptValue("AAV",ToStr(prior.aa.ss));
00312         doc.setOptValue("BBV",ToStr(prior.bb.ss));
00313         doc.setOptValue("ABV",ToStr(prior.ab.ss));
00314 
00315         doc.setOptValue("AAYV",ToStr(prior.aa.yss));
00316         doc.setOptValue("BBYV",ToStr(prior.bb.yss));
00317         doc.setOptValue("ABYV",ToStr(prior.ab.yss));
00318 
00319         doc.setOptValue("AAXY",ToStr(prior.aa.xyss));
00320         doc.setOptValue("ABXY",ToStr(prior.ab.xyss));
00321         doc.setOptValue("BBXY",ToStr(prior.bb.xyss));
00322 
00323         //Cryptic between-cluster terms
00324         doc.setOptValue("KXX",ToStr(prior.xab));
00325         doc.setOptValue("KAH",ToStr(prior.xah));
00326         doc.setOptValue("KHB",ToStr(prior.xhb));
00327         // Y versions
00328         doc.setOptValue("KYAB",ToStr(prior.yab));
00329         doc.setOptValue("KYAH",ToStr(prior.yah));
00330         doc.setOptValue("KYHB",ToStr(prior.yhb));
00331 
00332         // other parameters
00333         doc.setOptValue("COMVAR",ToStr(comvar));
00334         doc.setOptValue("HARD",ToStr(hardshell));
00335         doc.setOptValue("SB",ToStr(shellbarrier));
00336         doc.setOptValue("CM",ToStr(callmethod));
00337         doc.setOptValue("bins",ToStr(bins));
00338         doc.setOptValue("hints",ToStr(hints));
00339         doc.setOptValue("CP",ToStr(contradictionpenalty));
00340         doc.setOptValue("Hok",ToStr(hok));
00341         doc.setOptValue("mix",ToStr(mix));
00342         doc.setOptValue("bic",ToStr(bic));
00343         doc.setOptValue("CSepPen",ToStr(CSepPen));
00344         doc.setOptValue("CSepThr",ToStr(CSepThr));
00345         doc.setOptValue("lambda",ToStr(lambda));
00346         doc.setOptValue("wobble",ToStr(wobble));
00347         doc.setOptValue("copyqc",ToStr(copyqc));
00348         doc.setOptValue("copytype",ToStr(copytype));
00349         doc.setOptValue("clustertype",ToStr(clustertype));
00350         doc.setOptValue("ocean",ToStr(ocean));
00351         doc.setOptValue("inflatePRA",ToStr(inflatePRA));
00352         doc.setOptValue("IsoHetY",ToStr(IsoHetY));
00353     }
00354 };
